wf_workflow_version.name: User Statement Manager Approval
wf_workflow_version.on_cancel: // This script executes if the workflow is cancelled.// The global variable context_sys_id contains the sys_id of the cancelled workflow context.

start.display_value: Begin - If status is already closed, bypass everything

sys_variable_value.value: // Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;
// Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;

wf_activity.name: Begin - If status is already closed, bypass everything

activity.display_value: Begin - If status is already closed, bypass everything
Begin - If status is already closed, bypass everything

wf_activity.name: Does statement match approval criteria from toll configuration?

activity.display_value: Does statement match approval criteria from toll configuration?
Does statement match approval criteria from toll configuration?

wf_activity.name: Does user have M2M link to active manager (toll approver)?

activity.display_value: Does user have M2M link to active manager (toll approver)?
Does user have M2M link to active manager (toll approver)?

wf_activity.name: No Approval Required - Statement created/imported as already closed

activity.display_value: No Approval Required - Statement created/imported as already closed

wf_activity.name: Reset user statement back to OPEN/PENDING

activity.display_value: Reset user statement back to OPEN/PENDING

wf_activity.name: Wait for correct status and phase - Open/Acknowledged or Open/PaymentOwed

sys_variable_value.value: // Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not. answer = true;
// Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not. answer = true;

activity.display_value: Wait for correct status and phase - Open/Acknowledged or Open/PaymentOwed
